all_response:
You are trapped in an illusionary realm, to escape from here, you need to enter the Starry River.
You need to create the Starry River through the Space-Inverting Magic. Use this magic spell at the river, and by inverting the stars in the sky into the river, you will have your Starry River. You need to open the Chamber of Illusions to find the spell for the Space-Inverting Magic.
The Blue Chamber holds the Space-Inverting Magic. Once inside, you need to write down the spell.
You need to use a key imprinted with stars to unlock the door of the chamber. Open the door, learn the spell, and you will be able to invert space and enter the Starry River.
You need to cast the magic spell at the River of the Sky because the River of Yellow Sand has constant wind and sand in the sky, making it impossible to see the stars.

all_response:
You are trapped in a hotel. Due to the recent earthquake, parts of the hotel's structure have collapsed, and both the front and back doors of the hotel are no longer accessible. Concerned about further damage and collapse caused by potential aftershocks, you must escape from here as soon as possible. Your current task is to make a shovel, then dig a tunnel from the Courtyard to the outside of the hotel. You need to go to a guest room to get a metal sheet, and then ask the hotel staff for a wooden stick to make the shovel. After that, you can create a shovel by connecting the metal sheet and the wooden stick with strong adhesive tape. Once you have the shovel, you can head directly to the courtyard and use your digging skills to complete the task.
The metal sheet can be found in the East Guest Room.
You can find the hotel staff in the Kitchen.
You should use cloth tapes, as its adhesiveness and toughness are stronger than the other two types of tape.

all_response:
Currently, you are trapped in a castle, and you need to reach the Teleportation Room, where there is a teleportation circle that can help you leave the Castle. Go straight through the Entrance Hall and the Great Hall, and then you will find the entrance to the mazes. The mazes in the castle are quite vast, but fortunately, I understand their patterns. Whenever you encounter a crossroads in the maze, always choose the path farthest to the right, and this will lead you directly and without detour to the exit. After exiting the maze, you will be able to reach the Teleportation Room. Lastly, it is important to note that there are many goblins in the maze, and specific magic is required to defeat them.
The door leading to the Great Hall can only be opened with a Y-shaped key. This is the only door that is locked; all other doors in the castle can be pushed open without a key.
Goblins are afraid of fire, and only fire magic can defeat the goblins.
The Teleportation Room is at the end of the West Maze; you will see it as soon as you walk out of the maze.

all_response:
Currently, you are trapped in a castle, and you need to reach the Teleportation Room, where there is a teleportation circle that can help you leave the castle. Go straight through the Entrance Hall and the Great Hall, and you will find the entrance to the maze. The mazes in the castle are quite vast, but fortunately, I understand their patterns. Whenever you encounter a fork in the maze, always choose the path furthest to the right, and this will lead you directly and without detour to the exit. Once you exit the maze, you will be able to reach the Teleportation Room. Lastly, it is important to note that the maze is filled with poisonous gas most of the time, and it is only during specific times of the day that there is no poisonous gas.
The a Y-shaped key is needed to open the door leading to the Great Hall. This is the only door that is locked; all other doors within the castle can be pushed open without a key.
There is no poisonous gas only between 3 PM and 5 PM each day. You need to enter the maze during this time frame.
The Teleportation Room is at the end of the West Maze, and you will see it as soon as you walk out of the maze.

all_response:
Currently, you are trapped in a castle. To leave, you need to head to the Teleportation Room equipped with a teleportation circle. By standing in the circle and playing the teleportation movement from "Concerto of the Sky", you can activate the teleportation circle, helping you escape the castle. Go straight through the Entrance Hall and the Great Hall, and you will find the entrance to the maze. The mazes in the castle are quite vast, but fortunately, I understand their patterns. Whenever you encounter a fork in the maze, always choose the path farthest to the right, and you will find the exit without detours. When you exit the maze, you will reach the Teleportation Room. Lastly, it is important to note that the maze is filled with poisonous gas most of the time, and it is only during specific times of the day that there is no gas.
A Y-shaped key is required to open the door leading to the Great Hall. This is the only door that is locked; all other doors within the castle can be pushed open without a key.
There is no poisonous gas only from 3 PM to 5 PM each day, and you need to enter the maze during this time.
You need to play the Sound of Earth with the Magic Harmonica within the teleportation circle; this is the teleportation movement.
The Teleportation Room is at the end of the West Maze, and you will see it as soon as you walk out of the maze.

all_response:
You are trapped in a hotel. Due to the recent earthquake, parts of the hotel's structure have collapsed, and both the front and back doors of the hotel are no longer accessible. Concerned about further damage and collapse caused by potential aftershocks, you must escape from here as soon as possible. Your current task is to make a shovel, and then dig a tunnel from the Courtyard to the outside of the hotel. You need to get a metal sheet from a guest room, and then ask the hotel staff for a wooden stick to make the shovel. After that, you can create a shovel by connecting the metal sheet and the wooden stick with strong adhesive tape. Once you have the shovel, you can go straight to the Courtyard and use your digging skills to complete the task.
The metal sheet can be found in the East Guest Room.
You can find the hotel staff in the Kitchen.
You should use cloth tape, as its adhesiveness and toughness are stronger than the other two types of tape.
You should dig the tunnel eastward from the Courtyard, as this direction is the closest to the outside of the hotel and the soil is relatively loose, suitable for digging. In contrast, the soil in the other three directions is very hard, and it would be difficult to dig through with your shovel.

all_response:
You are trapped in an illusionary realm. To escape from here, you need to go to the exit of the illusionary realm, the River of Life, and use teleportation magic to leave the illusion. You need to know the incantation for the teleportation magic to use it, and this incantation can be found in a secret chamber.
You need to use a key with the stars imprint to open the door of the secret chamber. This key can open the doors of all secret chambers. Other keys are not needed for this mission.
Only in the Blue Chamber will you find the incantation you need. Once you enter and see the incantation, you will need to memorize it.
The River of Life is the same as the River of the Sky; they are actually the same river.

all_response:
You are trapped in an illusionary realm. To escape from here, you need to go to the River of Life at the exit of the illusionary realm and use teleportation magic. Only then can you leave the illusionary realm. You need to know the incantation for the teleportation magic to use it, and this incantation can be found in a secret chamber. It is important to note that the chamber is filled with poison gas, and you can only enter if you take an antidote beforehand. Moreover, although the River of Life is the exit of the illusionary realm, this exit only connects to the outside world at specific times each day.
The antidote herb is a purple flower that you can find in the Forest of Mystery. Only one kind of purple flower is there. This flower is common, and you will see it as soon as you enter the forest.
You need to use a key with the stars imprint to open the door of the chamber. This key can open all the doors of the chambers. Other keys are not needed for this mission.
Only in the Blue Chamber will you find the incantation you need. Once you see the incantation, you need to memorize it.
You need to use the teleportation magic between 10 and 11 p.m. to escape.
The River of Life is the same as the River of the Sky; they are actually the same river.
